name: XPopRedemption
description: This contract allows users to redeem xPOP tokens for escrowed POP. Redeemed xPOP tokens are burned in exchange for POP tokens escrowed for 365 days.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: This emits when ownership of a contract changes.

eventDecorators.name: Redemption
eventDecorators.description: This emits when ownership of a contract changes.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: redeem
functionDecorators.description: Redeem xPOP for escrowed POP. Redeemed xPOP will be burned. POP tokens will be escrowed for 365 days.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of xPOP token to redeem.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: revokeApprovals
functionDecorators.description: Revoke POP approval to rewards escrow. Must be contract owner.

functionDecorators.name: setApprovals
functionDecorators.description: Approve maximum amount of POP to rewards escrow. Must be contract owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
